name: Milk Man: Shit Edition
description:
Milk Man: Shit Edition is a very strange game where you play as MILK MAN and get milk from the store for your wife who is dying lmao. 

During the game, you will experience beautiful graphics, incredible voice acting , character development, gameplay mechanics, and... yeah i'm kidding this game was made for a jam where the goal is to make the worst game ever.

Btw the game was made in gamemaker that's why the 3d ""models"" are amazing.

This is the second, and probably last time I'm gonna use gamemaker for a 3d game because it's just not optimized for one.
